message.content:
1. Amygdala hemodynamic responses to positive stimuli are attenuated in major depressive disorder (MDD).
2. Amygdala hemodynamic responses to positive stimuli normalize with remission of MDD.

messages.content:
Statement: Amygdala hemodynamic responses to positive stimuli are attenuated in major depressive disorder (MDD), and normalize with remission.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
